feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 12:44 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -23.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 50 km/h gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
